1064670.name: Pathos
1064670.description:
A stealth puzzler game in the likes of Metal Gear Solid, Infiltrate a drug syndicate's operations and take down the organization-using their own drugs against them.

  • Use various chemical concoctions and your advanced dart gun to inject enemy guards and manipulate their emotions.
  • Bring chaos to the enemy's doorstep and watch guards turn on each other.
  • Immerse yourself in the chaos with a dynamic soundtrack that changes with the environment.
1064670.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
